URL.description: WebSocket connection URL for the video stream

fps.description: Current frames per second of the video stream

kbs.description: Current kilobytes per second of the video stream

token.description: Authentication token for WebSocket connection (Bearer token)

control.description: Enable control mode instead of normal video streaming

play_from.description: Start timestamp for playback as ISO string (e.g., '2025-08-15T10:00:00.000Z')

play_to.description: End timestamp for playback as ISO string (optional, plays until end if empty)

play.description: Start/stop playback with the specified time range

recording_reason.description: Reason for starting a recording session

goto.description: Go to specific timestamp in ISO format (e.g., '2025-08-15T10:30:00.000Z')

timestamp.description: Current video frame timestamp in ISO format (read-only, e.g., '2025-08-15T10:30:00.000Z')

ptz_move.description: PTZ move command as JSON string (e.g., '{"pan": 1, "tilt": 0, "zoom": 0}')

ptz_stop.description: Stop all PTZ movements when set to true

ptz_goto_preset.description: Go to PTZ preset as JSON string (e.g., '{"preset": 1}')

ptz_set_preset.description: Set PTZ preset as JSON string (e.g., '{"preset": 1, "name": "Entrance"}')

play_hls.description: Enable HLS player mode instead of WebSocket streaming
